Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own – Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Uncle King Julien abdicates his throne, handing off his crown to Prince Julien. Let the reign of King Julien the Thirteenth begin.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Best friends Tip and Oh drive each other crazy when he moves into the human world with her./Oh stirs up trouble when he tries to act like Santa Claus.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Sherman begs Peabody to keep a Wolly Mammoth he names Captain Cools as his pet; Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges to discover spaghetti.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Fang Decay Why is Thatch acting meaner than usual? He has a fang-ache! Scare Day Mantha is determined to become the first zombie ever to win the Super Boo?Scare School's ultimate scaring competition.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pat-Pat wants to play detective for the day with Noddy, but the only problem is that they don't have a case to solve... that is until the Pockets go missing. Where can they be? It's up to Noddy and Pat Pat to investigate!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and Horace want to play Boat Racing on the pond - but first the need work out how to make a boat! Some things are too heavy, some are too light… having tried lots of options and worked out that they need something light and boat shaped, they make Mimi's paper hats into boats for their boat race. Perfect!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Willow's apple picking party today, but some of the friends just are too chilly to go. Jess tries to work out how to keep them all warm, should they cover themselves in mud just like frogs do? Should they wrap themselves up in straw? Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelp’s “fun-crastinating” puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: A huge storm hits Dragon's Edge causing the Dragons to spook and run off but when Astrid is blinded, Hiccup must lead her to Stormfly.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: An extremely powerful new dragon attacks Dragon's Edge, and Hiccup makes a dangerous alliance while the fate of the Dragon Eye hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the others debate how to keep the dragons a secret, even as a rambunctious young “cloaking” dragon gets loose in town and pursues a friendship with a reluctant Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Cao’s enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Bei’s concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Engaged To Be Murdered
programme.desc: Amanda Finley will stop at nothing to keep her son Jackson from marrying Olivia, who she suspects of being after his money.

programme.title: Danger In The House
programme.desc: As his mother's illness progresses, a wealthy man hires a perfect caregiver. But their lives start to spiral into a deadly affair as the caregiver tries to make herself a permanent fixture.

programme.title: Dying For A Crown
programme.desc: Lydia and her daughter Elle have just relocated to Florida. Lydia is the new Assistant Principal at Bellview High. As prom season begins, Elle stops at nothing to become homecoming queen.

programme.title: Amish Stud: The Eli Weaver Story
programme.desc: This Lifetime original movie revisits the story of a man who called himself "Amish Stud" and plotted with his mistress to murder his wife, to the horror of his conservative Amish community.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: After two intense months, the couples have made it to their final dates, where they gather the information they need before deciding whether to continue their relationship in the real world.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Golden couple Olivia and Jackson are on the rocks, while boys' and girls' night descends into mayhem with fighting galore!

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: As the remaining couples come together for their final dinner party, long-running feuds and bottled-up emotions boil over, exposing cracks in more than one relationship.

programme.title: Burned By Love
programme.desc: A divorcee meets a seemingly perfect match on an online dating site, only to learn that he's a scammer. When she attempts to bring him to justice, he transforms into a violent stalker.

programme.desc: Buddy sees what's between the bread at two old school joints that hold a special place in his heart. He's heading to Fiore's House of Quality to taste their legendary Italian sandwiches.

programme.desc: The Dallas flippers purchase an unprepossessing investor flip with a poorly constructed garage-to-bedroom conversion. The challenge is to keep this flip within the 45-day timeline and a $45,000 budget.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Without Chauncey's knowledge, Derek purchases a zombie located in an historical conservation district, hindering the way these flippers are able to renovate the house.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Duke is BACK and ready to flip more zombies with our expert Zombie flippers, Keith and Alynne. The team checks out a vintage property in a desirable neighbourhood that needs quite an overhaul.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Our trio of flippers are ready to tackle a 100-year-old Craftsman home in upscale Delaney Park. With only one bathroom sandwiched between two bedrooms, this tiny Zombie needs a lot of work.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Team is back where it all began in the Jewel Oaks neighbourhood, where Duke and Keith first flipped a house together. Will they manage to restore this nightmare from the '60s as successfully as last time?

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)

programme.title: Hibla
programme.desc: Isabel and Clara are childhood friends from a small town who were separated when Clara's family moved to the city. As each of them seek their own idea of fulfillment, their motivations and actions will lead them to a tragic and inevitable end.

programme.title: Keka
programme.desc: Keka (Katya Santos) is a beautiful young woman working in a call centre. She hunts down the killers and avenge her boyfriend's death. Everything has been going well until she meets the guy, who makes her fall in love again.

programme.title: Mapanukso
programme.desc: Carlo (Gereld Lauron) is a kind and obedient son who just happen to earn a living as a macho dancer in a gay bar. Fate intervenes when he meets Jerome (Emilio Garcia), a gay production manager, who helps him alleviate his underprivileged life.

programme.title: I'm Sorry My Love
programme.desc: In the hope of landing a job that will eventually enable her to pay for her sister’s operation, Tinay (Judy Ann Santos) leaves her small fishing village and heads for Manila.

programme.title: Tililing

programme.title: Gluta

programme.title: Anong Ganap?

programme.title: Ikaw at Ako
programme.desc: From the challenges faced by a couple in their sunset years to the struggles of those in their mid-years, and the blossoming of a puppy love at a summer camp, this film explores the enduring power of love.

programme.title: Never Not Love You
programme.desc: It tells the story of young lovers who tries to build a life together until career opportunities sends them to a different country where their relationship will be tested.

programme.title: Just A Stranger

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: Spencer drops into the shop with some tasty new finds, but will Rick bite? Then, Chum and Rick disappear from the shop to meet up with a magician selling a zigzag box.

programme.title: Saudin: The Orangutan Whisperer

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: When Rick and Marty finally get underground in the Garden Shaft for the first time this year, they may be foiled by an ancient booby trap.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In the fourth episode of a five-part event, it's back to the Forged in Fire Gladiator Arena for two more sudden death battles. Our defending champion currently has four wins under his belt.

programme.title: Starlet
programme.desc: The story tells of an obedient daughter who,out of necessity,must do something to save the life of her ailing mother.

programme.title: Totoy Golem
programme.desc: Way back in the late 50's one of the most feared names on the streets of Manila was that of Totoy Golem of the then, notorious district of Tondo.

programme.title: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Two stories in one entertaining film about young people learning that happiness comes from learning how to give of one's self.

programme.title: Alyas Pogi 2
programme.desc: All patrolman Henry Cruz "Alyas Pogi" wants is to live a simple life with his son. But his former enemies would not allow it.

programme.title: Lucas Abelardo
programme.desc: His sincerity and great dedication to his work is what distinguished police officer Lucas Abelardo from his other colleagues. But keeping to his principles while doing his job is not easy.

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Dina played a Filipina working with a US-based chemical company. Eddie played the Chief of Police assigned to protect the chemical company visiting group which fell victim to a terrorist gang. Eddie was only too obsessed to save the company because Dina happened to be his girlfriend.

programme.title: Rocky N Rolly
programme.desc: The swindling trio of Rolly, Alex and Cleto earn big bucks by using different disguises to fool people. They soon join forces with ex-boxer, Rocky, who quit the sport after syndicate hench men beat him up for refusing him to join the game.

programme.title: Aso't Pusa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pamboy (Tito Sotto) risked being beaten to a pulp by Osang's father each time he came to defend the girl. He tried to convince to leave, but Osang (Aiza Seguerra) continued to show her love for her father even after he went into jail.

programme.title: Kasalanan Bang Sambahin Ka
programme.desc: As a last fling before getting married, Alex (Julio Diaz) dates his friend's cousin Catherine (Vivian Velez). When Alex still marries his fiancee Grace (Dawn Zulueta), Catherine makes life difficult by creating a scandal.

programme.title: Di Na Natuto (Sorry Na, Puede Ba?) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Ysmael (Robin Padilla) is the rich family's black sheep, unlike his older brother Bongbong. They both want to win the heart of their female worker, Carlota (Sharon Cuneta).

programme.title: Pinagbiyak Na Bunga (Lookalayk)
programme.desc: Watching Andrew E and Chiquito together as they play the parts of con-men who might indeed be father and son.

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Regalo
programme.desc: Tragedy had struck newlyweds, Daniel Fernando and Sheila Ysrael, when Daniel was paralyzed. Sheila was soon seduced by Dan Fernadez, a household help.

programme.title: Time Scoop Hunter
programme.desc: Sawajima Yuichi investigates matchmaking in the Edo period. Matchmaker Oume is known for her skill in finding successful matches. Discover what it was like finding a partner in old Tokyo.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: An expert cycling duo cuts across the Shiretoko peninsula, a World Natural Heritage site located in eastern Hokkaido. They excitedly introduce the local wildlife and magnificent summer views en route.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Gifts are exchanged in the traditional betrothal rite. Paper cords are twisted into intricate shapes and decorate gifts.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Face To Face
programme.desc: Face To Face is a talk show with the people making a difference in Japanese society today. The show's host is Robert Campbell, who is an expert in Japanese literature and culture.

programme.title: BOSAI: River Flooding
programme.desc: Disasters resulting from torrential rain are occurring almost every year. The main reason for the increasing severity of the damage is river flooding. What is responsible for the growing damage?

programme.title: Natural Stone Walls
programme.desc: Shiga / Nagayama Yuko (architect) For 400 years, a group of stonemasons have been building walls using natural stone. Nagayama learns how a stone's qualities are assessed and utilized.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Documentary 360
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship documentary series offers must-see episodes on politics, the economy, social trends, science and the environment in Japan and beyond.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Kiyo, Akira, and the Crested Ibise
programme.desc: In 2024, for the first time, Crested Ibises were released in the northern part of Sado Island in the Sea of Japan. This program features Kiyo and Akira, the driving force behind this initiative.

programme.title: AMAMI: Island Colors
programme.desc: Experience the colors of Amami Oshima in beautiful time-lapse footage. Unique hues include "Amami Blue" ocean waters and the glossy black of silk thread that's painstakingly dyed using wood and mud.

programme.title: Through the Kitchen Window
programme.desc: For over 50 years Sachiko has been making umeboshi pickled plums. Discover the reason behind her goal of making umeboshi that last more than a century!

programme.title: Is That Picture Real?
programme.desc: A billion cats are on the loose!? An online post throws the father into a panic. How should we interact with online information when fake images are on the rise, especially during disasters?

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: For Kajika frogs, romance is "ribbeting." Melodies reach ultrasonic frequencies. Battles feature headlocks and chokeholds. The tightest embrace allows pairs to squeeze into tight crevices to spawn.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kyoto in the autumn: the old capital is even more beautiful when dressed in fall colors. Witness the contemplative and quiet beauty of Kyoto through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Viewpoint Science
programme.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

programme.title: Story Land
programme.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The Professionals: Rice Farmer
programme.desc: Seki Tomoharu once turned his back on farming; now he grows legendary rice that wins international awards. Why did he change? Amid rice shortages and global warming, he pursues his own green farming.

programme.title: Dining with the Chef mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: Homemade Udon Noodles with Poached Eggs/ Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking with Chef Rika in five minutes!

programme.title: 72 Crucial Hours : Noto Earthquake
programme.desc: New Year's Day 2024. Japan's Noto Peninsula was hit by a huge earthquake and tsunami. Many lives were lost. One year later, as they look to the future, survivors share stories of courage and grief.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: The word yakumi refers to the use of traditional herbs and spices. Japanese food wouldn't be the same without favorites like wasabi or yuzu. See how these and more are influencing global food trends.

programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-13.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japan is a hot spot for discovering dinosaur fossils. An excavation in Hokkaido sparked a nationwide enthusiasm for dinosaurs, leading to entertainment such as dinosaur robots and mechanical suits.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Cats live near three torii gates in the sea. The beach changes at low tide. We also meet a cat who lives in a pottery production area. She's allowed in all the shops and inspects the merchandise.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION
programme.desc: This episode spotlights director Yoshiura Yasuhiro, known for Sing a Bit of Harmony. We present three pivotal shorts and take a look at his bold creative experiments with kaiju, comedy, and robots.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The festival on October 22 pays homage to Kyoto's 1200-year history with people parading in period costumes. Discover the citizens' resilience as they created a new Kyoto.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Today: identifying your chance to speak at a meeting. Timothy James Mahrt, from the United States, works at an IT firm in Tokyo. He has difficulty finding the right time to speak up.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Meet people around Japan who strive for a life without waste under the traditional philosophy of "MOTTAINAI," which values cherishing the things we have.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION
programme.desc: This episode spotlights director Yoshiura Yasuhiro, known for Sing a Bit of Harmony. We present three pivotal shorts and take a look at his bold creative experiments with kaiju, comedy, and robots.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: NHK WORLD SELECTION

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-13.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japan is a hot spot for discovering dinosaur fossils. An excavation in Hokkaido sparked a nationwide enthusiasm for dinosaurs, leading to entertainment such as dinosaur robots and mechanical suits.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Cats live near three torii gates in the sea. The beach changes at low tide. We also meet a cat who lives in a pottery production area. She's allowed in all the shops and inspects the merchandise.

programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger and his kitties accidentally set Lizzy's Lemonade Stand and parts of Foggy Bottom ablaze. It's up to the Fire Rescue pups to extinguish the fires!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Arrby recruits a crew of Meerkats to gather magical seeds. It's up to the Pups to recover the seeds and rescue Arrby and crew.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Farmer Yumi and Al's baby goat birthday party goes up in flames. Humdinger goes camping, he has just one thing on his mind: s'mores.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 8
programme.desc: In one of the most unusual big money auctions yet, Sean auctions the contents of abandoned big-rigs. Scott and Jesse go head to head over a space age haul, while Brandon and Lori take a chance on a battle-ready rig. Meanwhile, Papa Bear goes all in for some vintage fun stuff - and he isn't in the mood to play games.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 9
programme.desc: It's wheels up for Papa Bear when he takes a gamble on a mysterious covered item. Meanwhile, the newcomer Alvarado brothers find an unusual collectible hiding in plain sight -- but are they going to flush their money down the toilet? And Brandon andLori find out whether a pet bin will turn out to be their best friend.

programme.title: Friends S6 9
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Chandler tries to gain favor with Monica's parents – but an old secret involving Ross causes problems. Undomestic Rachel's dessert proves intriguing.

programme.title: Friends S6 10
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine on a televised New Year's Eve dance show. Ross and Monica resurrect their dorky high school dance routine for the broadcast.

programme.title: Friends S6 11
programme.desc: Janine forces Joey to choose between her and his friends. Rachel buys an apothecary table from a store that Phoebe abhors.

programme.title: Friends S6 12
programme.desc: Chandler is upset when a men's magazine prints Ross' cartoon; both Chandler and Ross claim to have originated the joke.

programme.title: Friends S6 13
programme.desc: Rachel tries to help her pampered younger sister, Jill, find independence--but Jill flirting with Ross is not part of the plan.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 1
programme.desc: Lori knows from her research that two of these bins previously belonged to the same owner. She and Brandon win one of them, an aviation bin; now they have to find the other one. But things don't go the way they want when Dan, the Biker Dude, ends upwith the matching bin; now they either have to make a deal, or get stuck with half a plane.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 2
programme.desc: Jesse finds a bin that is out of this world, while Team Brandori gambles on some dangerous games. New player Mone proves she's not here to play games - she is the game baby! And she's not afraid to find out what's inside the creepiest box yet!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 16
programme.desc: When Sheldon is forced to take a vacation by the university, he goes to work with Amy in her neurobiology lab.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 10
programme.desc: Does Big Bear mean Big Money? The Alvarados get sneaky while Desert Dan horses around, and frustration gets the best of Brandori. Do they strike gold or strike out? As Jesse crushes dreams, who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 11
programme.desc: Brandon goes out on a limb, and finds himself sinking in quicksand with no help from Lori - will Desert Dan lend him a hand? Dan's car smarts come in handy, while T Money rocks out with his win. Will Scott and Chrissy climb to the top, or fall hard in today's auction?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 12
programme.desc: Scott blows his wad on an Oktoberfest bin, and will have to drown his sorrows. The Alvarado Brothers bid big on collectibles -- will they draw a wild card? T Money rides away with a big win, while Brandon and Lori investigate a crime scene bin. Willeveryone make it out of the auction alive?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 13
programme.desc: Sean holds a one of a kind auction in Malibu, at the Rolls Royce of storage facilities. T Money needs a robot -- but does that mean he'll get it? Jesse draws on his pinball skills to outwit his competitors, while Brandon and Lori take one of the biggest gambles of their career. Will it pay off with an unbelievable score, or will they be crying all the way to the bank?

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 1
programme.desc: The guys talk ticks, tricks, and antics! What's with Murr's fool proof plans? And Joe's crazy faces? And why is Sal always falling down?! Plus, see the Jokers' best bloopers, and learn all about the guys' annoying habits that aren't captured on camera!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: In this competitive episode Sal, Joe, Q, and Murr battle head-to-head in fierce Joker vs. Joker challenges! The guys go two-on-two as they conduct focus groups where they focus mostly on making things uncomfortable. They pitch fabulous and tasty mascot ideas to diehard baseball fans. Then, Joe and Q, break-it-down old-school-style at the mall. And finally, Sal and Murr face-off in a challenge that literally proves neither is book smart.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 3
programme.desc: Murr, Sal, Q, and Joe share secrets with shoppers in a grocery store, but when one shopper has a history with Murr the embarrassment escalates to a whole new level! Then, the guys get creative in an art store, and convince New Yorkers to be featuredin their wacky blogs. And tonight's big loser heads to the airport with a travel itinerary that would make anyone nauseous.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 4
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr and Sal get themselves into some hairy predicaments at the beauty supply store. Then, they discover that a language barrier adds to the awkwardness during a text message challenge in Time's Square. And later, a panel of esteemed educators offers no help to tonight's stammering loser.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 5
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q spread the love as attendants in a bridal dress shop much to the dismay of the brides-to-be, and break a sacred guy-code in the process. Plus, they attempt to sway frightened focus groups with fragrance campaigns that truly stink. Then the punishment takes an unexpected and never before seen twist when the big loser wonders if he's too old to get a visit from the tooth fairy.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 6
programme.desc: In a day filled with explosive surprises, Team Brandori looks for a big win as the Alvarado Brothers take a gamble and let the pros get under their skin. A fiery contraption has T Money wondering if he scored big or will go down in flames.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori go for the gold - but find something even better. Jesse takes a swing at Team Brandori, while T- Money does some dangerous bidding of his own. But when the dust settles, will Scott and Chrissy drive away with the golden prize?

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 06
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke put the best shaving hacks to the test in the ultimate beard-off, and find out if using a drill to eat corn is hack or wack. Plus, they'll welcome toothpaste into the All-Star Club and use pencil lead to make a light bulb.

programme.desc: Explore hacks for all ages, from staying clean while eating ribs, to staying young in your golden years. Plus, watch hacks for making soap and hanging shelves, and get ready to welcome the twist tie to the All Star Club.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Travelogue

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 24
programme.desc: Andrea Nierhoff brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food - Episode 4
programme.desc: Chef Khanh Ong explores Eyre Peninsula, South Australia. In shark infested waters he conquers his fears and jumps in to learn how to hunt underwater. Locals teach him how to spear fish and four-wheel drive through sand dunes.

programme.title: Roads Unknown India - Episode 4
programme.desc: Roads Unknown: India follows Australian adventure riding pioneer Jess Zahra, as she embarks on an unforgettable 5000km motorbike quest across India, unveiling the country's scenic landscapes and cultural richness.

programme.title: Larapinta - Episode 2
programme.desc: Talia visits Chambers Pillars, a national park established by Traditional Owners, to see how a dreaming site has been desecrated. What are the long-term implications of buffel grass devastating Central Australia's landscape?

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia - 1980: Julie Anthony, John Olsen, Alan Bond
programme.desc: Michael Parkinson interviews guests Julie Anthony, John Olsen and Alan Bond.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Tuvalu's Land Makers - Alan
programme.desc: With sea levels on the rise because of climate change, Alan Resture is on a mission to help protect his homeland and that involves making land, literally! We see how it's done.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Episode 21
programme.desc: The National Press Club hosts public debates and discussions that shape Australia now and into the future. Home to national conversations with decision-makers and influencers; driving the national debate forward.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 24
programme.desc: Andrea Nierhoff brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.desc: The final episode explores topics that impact today's teens more than any previous generation. From the terrifying rise of anxiety and depression to the proliferation of Artificial Intelligence and deep fake technology.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Fuschia Lady
programme.desc: We meet a gardener whose home and garden are filled with fancy fuchsias of every variety.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 21
programme.desc: Host Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sporting minds examine all the latest news and action from the AFL, NRL, the countdown to State of Origin Game 3, plus Super Netball and the lead up to Wimbledon.

programme.desc: The continuing war in Gaza has left Jewish and Muslim communities here in Australia traumatised and afraid. Antisemitism and Islamophobia are on the rise. Are conversations and friendship still possible? And at what cost?

programme.title: The Role Of A Lifetime - Episode 5
programme.desc: The final episode explores topics that impact today's teens more than any previous generation. From the terrifying rise of anxiety and depression to the proliferation of Artificial Intelligence and deep fake technology.

programme.title: Camel Capers - Camel Quest
programme.desc: Camels have flourished on some properties where drought has forced cattle to be destocked. It's fed the idea there's a commercial market for camel meat, milk and skincare just waiting to be tapped.

programme.title: Meet The Neighbours - Episode 3
programme.desc: The trials and tribulations of the social experiment shine a light on what the bigger solutions might be for struggling small towns right across Australia, and what the future might be like.

programme.title: This Place - There are Four 'A's in Ballarat
programme.desc: Warrenyeep, also called Mt Warrenheep, means "emu feathers". A long time ago, it was covered in ferns, which looked like emu feathers from a distance to the Wathaurung people. It is near Ballaarat, in Wadawurrung country.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend - Episode 52
programme.desc: When you need to know what's happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you today's events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 21
programme.desc: Host Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sporting minds examine all the latest news and action from the AFL, NRL, the countdown to State of Origin Game 3, plus Super Netball and the lead up to Wimbledon.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 52

programme.title: Compass - Friends During Wartime

programme.title: ABC News Overnight - Episode 52

programme.title: Aussie Mavericks - Self-Made Woman
programme.desc: From sheep breeder to shearer, grain trader to truck driver. She was raised to be a wife and mother. Instead, this woman has set up more businesses and tackled more jobs than many people do in a lifetime.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan 2
programme.desc: Haunted since childhood, orphan Azlinda believes her torment stems from her parents' dark history. Her friends Zurina, Wati, and Ustaz join forces to end her suffering, but a malevolent demon interrupts their efforts. Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. programme.desc: After a man is gunned down at an after-hours club, investigators and the prosecutor are left with no witnesses willing to provide testimony, leaving the case hanging on the defendant's self-defence claim.

programme.desc: A car chase transpires to rescue a hostage being held at gunpoint. After being shocked by 14,000 volts of electricity, a man's chance of survival is in the hands of his friend.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss whole numbers up to 100, ordinal numbers up to 10th, money up to PhP100.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach rhyming words, greetings and leave-takings, and the different elements of a story.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala sa sarili bilang Pilipino gamit ang konsepto ng pagpapatuloy at pagbabago.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang paggamit ng magagalang na pananalita, pagsasabi ng mensahe, paksa o tema ng patalastas at kuwento. Tinuturo din ng mga palabas na ito ang tungkol sa pagsulat ng parirala at pangungusap.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 1000, ordinal numbers up to 20th, and money up to PhP100. These videos also teach addition of whole numbers up to 1000 including money.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about different sounds, the alphabet, elements of the story, and action words. These also discuss the use of proper and common nouns and a and an.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang kahalagahan ng kinabibilangang komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, iba't ibang bahagi ng aklat, diksyunaryo, at elemento ng kuwento. Ipinapakita rin dito ang pagbabasa at pagbabaybay ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach whole numbers up to 10 000, ordinal numbers up to 100th, and money up to PhP1000. These videos also teach addition and subtraction of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes discuss about writing different kinds of sentences, descriptive paragraphs, and diaries. These episodes also show how to use common and proper nouns, plural forms of regular and irregular nouns, and how to read words, phrases, and sentences with short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kinalalagyan ng mga lalawigan sa rehiyong kinabibilangan ayon sa katangiang heograpikal nito.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about ways of sorting materials and describing them as solid, liquid or gas based on observable properties.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pangngalan at mga panghalip. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita, pagtukoy ng mga elemento ng kuwento at pagsagot ng mga tanong tungkol dito.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 100,000. These also teach multiplication and division of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the parts of a paragraph, different resources, and significant details of different text types. These also talk about various ways of identifying the meaning of words.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pagkakakilanlan ng bansa ayon sa mga katangiang heograpikal gamit ang mapa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on grouping different materials based on their properties. These episodes also discuss the changes that materials undergo when exposed to certain conditions.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pangngalan, panghalip, magagalang na pananalita, at mga sanggunian. Pag-uusapan din dito ang pagsagot sa mga tanong, pabibigay ng hinuha, opinyon, solusyon, pagsunod-sunod ng mga pangyayari, at pagsusuri ng maikling pelikula.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the four fundamental operations involving fractions and decimals.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about analyzing images, interpreting the meaning of visual media, and making co ections between information viewed and personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa bahagi ng Pilipinas sa globalisasyon batay sa lokasyon nito sa mundo gamit ang mga kasanayang pangheograpiya at ang ambag ng malayang kaisipan sa pag-usbong ng nasyonalismong Pilipino.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the different types of mixtures and their characteristics and the different techniques to separate mixtures.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri at pagsusulat ng tula, bugtong, sawikain, talata, karunungang-bayan, at pananaliksik.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of factors of polynomials, rational algebraic expressions, linear equations and inequalities in two variables, systems of linear equations and inequalities in two variables and linear functions.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use modals, adverbs, adjectives and nouns. These videos also focus on determining the meaning of words and expressions and citing sources.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa interaksiyon ng tao sa kaniyang kapaligiran na nagbigay-daan sa pag-usbong ng mga sinaunang kabihasnan na nagkaloob ng mga pamanang humubog sa pamumuhay ng kasalukuyang henerasyon.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes are about Newton’s three laws of motion, force, power, and different kinds of energy. These also teach the propagation of sound, properties and characteristics of visible light, heat and temperature, and the effects of heat on the body, and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa mga mitolohiya, parabula, at nobela. Ipinapaliwanag din dito ang wastong paggamit ng pokus ng pandiwa at panghalip, paggamit ng angkop na hudyat sa pagsunud-sunod ng mga pangyayari.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of sequences, polynomials and polynomial equations.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use information from various resources, determine the effect of textual aids, and analyzing materials viewed. These videos also focus on evaluating texts.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 1
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 9
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 12
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 3
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. programme.title: Sing Galing Season 3 Ep 23
programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. If the contestant fails to sing the right lyrics and in tune, an animated genie would pop up on the screen and strike an animated gong to signal the end of the unfortunate aspirant's chance at instant wealth and glory.

programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
